text: Gabriel LaBelle (born September 2002) is a Canadian actor. He is best known for his roles as young Sammy Fabelman in Steven Spielberg's semi- autobiographical movie The Fabelmans (2022), and as young producer Lorne Michaels in the biographical movie Saturday Night (2024). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Gabriel LaBelle
